title: India's L&T Infotech, Mindtree merge to create $18 billion tech company - Reuters
content: India's L&T Infotech, Mindtree merge to create $18 billion tech company  Reuters
description: Indian conglomerate Larsen & Toubro will merge its Mindtree Ltd and L&T Infotech software units to create a $17.69 billion company, building scale to compete for larger deals in a booming market for IT services since the pandemic.
